entity.name: Roy Cooper
entity.description:
US governor of North Carolina, 
Roy Cooper

text: @NC_Governor Please, coronavirus must not be as serious as has been pushed. I’m done with that. Economic ruin seems like a goal to me-who benefits at the end of the day? I mean after this violence as well? More economic ruin. Guess a few billionaires can ruin a nation. Maybe we should pack
